name: Type-6 Warp Drive
description: Reliable warp drive used in most mid-tier vessels, offering good range and efficiency.

name: Type-9 Warp Drive
description: High-performance warp system designed for fast-response missions and long-distance travel.

name: Transwarp Coil Prototype
description: Unstable experimental drive capable of transwarp speeds with significant energy cost and operational risk.
